      • doGet

        public void doGet(HttpServletRequest request,
                  HttpServletResponse response)
           throws IOException,
                  ServletException
        Main hcdler. Returns a requested product in the HTTP stream or dumps an HTML status page. The default *action* is to generate a product and return it through stream. This Servlet handles the requests in URL * http://localhost:8080/nutshell/NutShell? * Files that have no been found (Error 404) TODO: request-response wrapper to support offline testing
        Throws:
        IOException
        ServletException
